Somewhere There's Hope

OLTL ~Todd Meets Hope

"Somewhere There's Hope"

When you're runnin' baby

You can't let go

Life's on the line

When you're runnin', runnin', runnin'

From a cold, cold world

Voices, they cry

Somewhere there's hope (somewhere there's hope)

Somebody please (somebody please)

Somewhere there's hope, waitin' there, waitin' there

Ooh, the wheels of fear

Turn truth into lies

Like a thief in the night

Hold on through the smoke

And through the fire

No one can hide

'Cause somewhere there's hope (somewhere there's hope)

Somebody please (somebody please)

Somewhere there's hope, waitin' there, waitin' there

Somewhere there's hope (somewhere there's hope)

Somebody please (somebody please)

Waitin' there, waitin' there

Somewhere there's hope (somewhere there's hope)

Somebody please (somebody please)

Somewhere there's hope, waitin' there, waitin' there
